mapper.insert: INSERT INTO approval(doc_no, doc_type, approval_order, status, start_date, end_date, use_day, title, content, memo, filename1, filename2, filename3, reg_date, reg_employee_no, mod_date, mod_employee_no) VALUES (#{docNo}||SEQ_APPROVAL_NO.NEXTVAL, #{docType}, #{docApprovalOrder}, #{docStatus}, #{startDate:VARCHAR}, #{endDate:VARCHAR}, #{useDay:INTEGER}, #{title}, #{content}, #{memo:VARCHAR}, #{fileName1:VARCHAR}, #{fileName2:VARCHAR}, #{fileName3:VARCHAR}, sysdate, #{regEmployeeNo}, sysdate, #{modEmployeeNo})
mapper.select: SELECT a.doc_no as doc_no, a.doc_type as doc_type, a.approval_order as approval_order, a.status as status, a.start_date as start_date, a.end_date as end_date, a.use_day as use_day, a.title as title, a.content as content, a.memo as memo, a.filename1 as filename1, a.filename2 as filename2, a.filename3 as filename3, a.reg_date as reg_date, a.reg_employee_no as reg_employee_no, a.mod_date as mod_date, a.mod_employee_no as mod_employee_no, e.employee_name as employee_name, d.department_name as department_name, p.position_name as position_name FROM approval a, employee e, department d, position p WHERE a.doc_no = #{docNo} and a.reg_employee_no = e.employee_no and d.department_no = e.department_no and p.position_no = e.position_no

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT inner_table.* , ROWNUM AS row_seq FROM ( SELECT a.doc_no as doc_no, a.doc_type as doc_type, a.approval_order as approval_order, a.status as status, a.start_date as start_date, a.end_date as end_date, a.use_day as use_day, a.title as title, a.content as content, a.memo as memo, a.filename1 as filename1, a.filename2 as filename2, a.filename3 as filename3, a.reg_date as reg_date, a.reg_employee_no as reg_employee_no, a.mod_date as mod_date, a.mod_employee_no as mod_employee_no, e.employee_name as employee_name, d.department_name as department_name, p.position_name as position_name FROM approval a, employee e, department d, position p WHERE a.reg_employee_no = e.employee_no
and (a.reg_employee_no = #{searchEmployeeNo} or a.reg_employee_no in (SELECT ae.employee_no FROM approval_employee ae WHERE ae.doc_no = a.doc_no and ae.gubun = '2' and ae.employee_no = #{searchEmployeeNo})) and a.reg_employee_no in (SELECT ae.employee_no FROM approval_employee ae WHERE ae.doc_no = a.doc_no and ae.gubun = '2' and ae.employee_no = #{searchEmployeeNo}) and (a.reg_employee_no = #{searchEmployeeNo} or a.reg_employee_no in (SELECT ae.employee_no FROM approval_employee ae WHERE ae.doc_no = a.doc_no and ae.gubun = '1' and ae.employee_no = #{searchEmployeeNo})) and a.reg_employee_no in (SELECT ae.employee_no FROM approval_employee ae WHERE ae.doc_no = a.doc_no and ae.gubun = '2' and ae.employee_no = #{searchEmployeeNo})
and a.status in ('1','2')
and a.status in ('3','9')
and d.department_no = e.department_no and p.position_no = e.position_no
and a.title like '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%'
ORDER BY a.reg_date desc, a.doc_no desc) inner_table WHERE ROWNUM <= #{endRowNum} ) WHERE row_seq BETWEEN #{startRowNum} AND #{endRowNum}

and (a.reg_employee_no = #{searchEmployeeNo} or a.reg_employee_no in (SELECT ae.employee_no FROM approval_employee ae WHERE ae.doc_no = a.doc_no and ae.gubun = '2' and ae.employee_no = #{searchEmployeeNo})) and a.reg_employee_no in (SELECT ae.employee_no FROM approval_employee ae WHERE ae.doc_no = a.doc_no and ae.gubun = '2' and ae.employee_no = #{searchEmployeeNo}) and (a.reg_employee_no = #{searchEmployeeNo} or a.reg_employee_no in (SELECT ae.employee_no FROM approval_employee ae WHERE ae.doc_no = a.doc_no and ae.gubun = '1' and ae.employee_no = #{searchEmployeeNo})) and a.reg_employee_no in (SELECT ae.employee_no FROM approval_employee ae WHERE ae.doc_no = a.doc_no and ae.gubun = '2' and ae.employee_no = #{searchEmployeeNo})
and a.status in ('1','2')
